articles.description: Matt LaMarca uses the FantasyLabs tools, projections, and Player Models to break down the NBA DFS main slate on DraftKings and FanDuel.
articles.content:
Saturday features a four-game slate starting at 1 p.m. ET.
Let’s dive into some of the top plays on the slate using the FantasyLabs tools and metrics.
